org.apache.flink.runtime.execution.librarycache

Interface LibraryCacheManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlobLibraryCacheManager, FallbackLibraryCacheManager

    public interface LibraryCacheManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClassLoader getClassLoader(JobID id)
      Returns the user code class loader associated with id.
      File getFile(BlobKey blobKey)
      Returns a file handle to the file identified by the blob key.
      void register(JobID id, Collection<BlobKey> requiredJarFiles)
      Registers a job with its required jar files.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown method
      void unregister(JobID id)
      Unregisters a job from the library cache manager.

    • Method Detail

      • getClassLoader

        ClassLoader getClassLoader(JobID id)
        Returns the user code class loader associated with id.
        Parameters:
        id - identifying the job
        Returns:
        ClassLoader which can load the user code

      • getFile

        File getFile(BlobKey blobKey)
             throws IOException
        Returns a file handle to the file identified by the blob key.
        Parameters:
        blobKey - identifying the requested file
        Returns:
        File handle
        Throws:
        IOException

      • register

        void register(JobID id,
            Collection<BlobKey> requiredJarFiles)
              throws IOException
        Registers a job with its required jar files. The jar files are identified by their blob keys.
        Parameters:
        id - job ID
        requiredJarFiles - collection of blob keys identifying the required jar files
        Throws:
        IOException

      • unregister

        void unregister(JobID id)
        Unregisters a job from the library cache manager.
        Parameters:
        id - job ID

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
              throws IOException
        Shutdown method
        Throws:
        IOException
